messages.title: A Personal Message
messages.content: This is why I'm proud to stand for Parliament. Thanks to the Liberal Democrats, we have begun to build a stronger economy in a fairer society. I believe every child should go to a good school and be treated fairly in a compassionate Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aiming for a stronger economy and fairer society, where everyone can get on in life.
Belief in the importance that every child should be able to go to a good school.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you voted Labour last time, consider that Lib Dems are now 2nd and only need a 7.7% swing to win.

issues.education: Every child should go to a good school.
issues.socialWelfare: To be treated fairly in a compassionate Britain.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want every child to be able to attend a good school and to build a life in a compassionate Britain. I understand the desire for a local MP who is also an experienced businessman and who can guide our economy to bring jobs and prosperity.

politicalExperience.achievements: Experienced in guiding economy to bring jobs and prosperity.
